description: [Maze](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0449) has decrypted strings and other important information during the encryption process. [Maze](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0449) also calls certain functions dynamically to hinder analysis.(Citation: McAfee Maze March 2020)

external_references.description: Mundo, A. (2020, March 26). Ransomware Maze. Retrieved May 18, 2020.
